item.title: Hunting to Cut a Third of Europe Jobs as Focus Shifts to Mideast
item.description: Hunting Plc plans to cut a third of its European jobs as the supplier to oil and gas industries shifts focus to the Middle East amid expectations of weaker North Sea drilling.
